text:
This week, we'll be discussing
the power of visualizations

and for using analytics
to stop crime.

In the first lecture, we'll
use data from the World Health

that help us understand
and communicate

In the second lecture, we'll
discuss predictive policing,

and how police departments
across the country

are using data and analytics
to improve decision making.

Through these examples, we'll
create visualizations in R

that help us understand
our data and our models.
